tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  media_id INT,
  rating FLOAT,
  review_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Reviews (
    review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    media_id UUID NOT NULL,
    rating FLOAT NOT NULL,
    review_text TEXT,
    review_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Media (
    media_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    media_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    release_date DATE,
    director VARCHAR(100),
    genre VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE movies (
    movie_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    genre VARCHAR(50),
    release_date DATE,
    rating DECIMAL(3,1)
);

CREATE TABLE tv_shows (
    show_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    genre VARCHAR(50),
    first_air_date DATE,
    rating DECIMAL(3,1)
);

CREATE TABLE media_products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    type VARCHAR(50),
    release_date DATE,
    rating DECIMAL(3,1)
);

CREATE TABLE MovieReviews (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	title VARCHAR(255),
	rating INT,
	review TEXT);

CREATE TABLE TVShowReviews (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	title VARCHAR(255),
	rating INT,
	review TEXT);

CREATE TABLE MediaProductReviews (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	title VARCHAR(255),
	rating INT,
	review TEXT);

CREATE TABLE UserProfiles (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	username VARCHAR(255),
	email VARCHAR(255),
	age INT);

CREATE TABLE movies (
    movie_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    movie_title VARCHAR(255),
    release_year INT,
    genre VARCHAR(100),
    user_rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE tv_shows (
    show_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    show_title VARCHAR(255),
    release_year INT,
    genre VARCHAR(100),
    user_rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating FLOAT,
    review_date DATE
);
